description: {"blocks":[{"key":"flr6l","text":"Protocol for performing an SDS-PAGE Western blot analysis using the BioRad Criterion Blotter system.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6cqe5","text":"Load samples onto a 4-12% Bis-Tris (NuPage) gel with MOPS buffer (ThermoFisher). If using SDS loading dye (with 5% SDS final concentration), all lanes must contain the same volume of sample. Ensure all lanes are filled with 1x SDS loading dye at the same volumes as the sample/marker lanes. If this is not done, samples will spread according to the total sample volume, and the wells will not run evenly. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aflhk","text":"Run gels according to the following gradient: 100 V ( ), 150 V ( ), 200 V (until the dye front has reached the desired distance – typically ~40 min). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":53,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":64,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"90n7f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5d7g4","text":"Cut 1x piece of PVDF (0.45 um), and 2x pieces of Whatman paper per gel, according to the gel dimensions. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c5k18","text":"Place the PVDF membrane into methanol for ~ 5 seconds, remove the methanol and wash the membrane three times in distilled water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5egmc","text":"Place the membrane in cold (   ) 20% methanol Bis-Tris transfer buffer (Thermofisher)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":29,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1tal8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9ls7m","text":"Remove the gel from the cassette and place in ice cold 20% methanol Bis-Tris transfer buffer (ThermoFisher)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"53jp","text":"Add a frozen ice pack to the Criterion Blotter transfer tank, and fill the tank with cold transfer buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fuv9o","text":"Soaking each Whatman paper piece in transfer buffer for ~ 5 sec before use, assemble the following transfer stack: 1x Whatman, SDS-PAGE gel, PVDF membrane, 1x Whatman, rolling each layer to prevent bubbles accumulating between pieces","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bev9l","text":"Place the transfer stack between sponges and secure them in the cassette in the correct orientation, and place the cassette in the transfer tank. If transferring 1 gel, ensure an empty cassette containing only sponges is placed in the second cassette holder in the tank. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d7pub","text":"Run the transfer at 100 V for  . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":30,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"42qk8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e7d2m","text":"Remove the membrane from the transfer stack and place into destain (50% methanol/7% acetic acid) for   rocking at  . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":101,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":114,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8l1p9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"qe2j","text":"Wash the membrane 3x in 0.05% v/v Tween/PBS for   rocking at  . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":48,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":61,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"co1vi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}
